scripts.install: cd client && yarn install && cd ../server && yarn install
scripts.build: cd client && yarn run build && cd ../server && yarn run build
scripts.prod: npx concurrently 'cd client && yarn dev --host' 'cd server && yarn start'
scripts.dev: npx concurrently 'cd client && yarn dev --host' 'cd client && yarn storybook' 'cd server && yarn start'
